multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; US inflation expectations and tariff‑driven cost pressures will lift 10‑yr yields by 10‑20 bp and strengthen the USD index by 0.5‑1 % around the September 9 event.

category.motivation: Apple’s iPhone 17 launch is a company event that is expected to influence market yields and currency indices, fitting the company_update category.

impact.motivation: The article reports a major Apple iPhone 17 launch expected to lift UST 10‑year yields by 10–20 bp and strengthen the USD index (DXY) by 0.5–1 % due to tariff and inflation expectations, directly impacting the node.

time_frame.motivation: The article focuses on a single upcoming event that could affect UST 10‑year yields and the USD index in the short term.

article_node.title: iPhone 17 release date, iOS 26 features and everything else to know about Apple's upcoming lineup
article_node.summary: Apple is set to unveil its iPhone 17 lineup on September 9, with rumors of a $50 price hike and a slimmer Air model. The event could push UST 10‑year yields up 10–20 bp and strengthen the USD index (DXY) by 0.5–1 % as tariffs and higher component costs raise inflation expectations. The price increase is contingent on tariff policy remaining unchanged; a reversal could dampen the impact. The launch is expected to be the main catalyst for these moves, with the event date as the key window.
